page.title: 12SHOPPING HABITS
page.content: SHOPPING FACILITIES ARE VERY LIMITED IN KENN AND KENNFORD. IN KENNFORD THERE IS ONE SMALL GENERAL SHOP WHICH ALSO ACTS AS A POST OFFICE.THE INHABITANTS IN THE MAIN DO THEIR SHOPPING ON A WEEKLY BASIS. THIS MEANS THAT ONCE A WEEK THEY WILL TRAVEL BY EITHER PRIVATE CAR OR PUBLIC TRANSPORT TO EITHER EXETER OR NEWTON ABBOT TO GET THEIR GROCERIES AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS. THEY WILL GET THEIR PERISHABLE FOODS IN THE VILLAGE ON A DAILY BASIS. THESE SHOPPING TRIPS ARE NOT POPULAR TO EXETER BECAUSE OF TRAFFIC CONJESTION IN THE CITY. PEOPLE DO BUY FROZEN VEGETABLES AND KEEP THEM AT HOME IN FREEZERS WHEN SHOPPING IN THE CITY. MILK IS DELIVERED EACH DAY TO EACH RESIDENCE BY A MILKMAN.
